Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute near Pershing/Wells
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses temp. rerouted EB: 39th, Wallace, Root, Princeton and 39th; Wb: 39th, Princeton, Root, Wallace and 39th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 39th and Wells due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 39th, Wallace, Root and Princeton and 39th.

Westbound buses will operate via 39th, Princeton, Root, Wallace and 39th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near 71st/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Southbound 53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 71st, Kedzie, 79th, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near 71st/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 71st, Kedzie, 79th, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near 71st/Pulaski.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Westbound 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, 79th, Pulaski, and 76th due to, street blockage near 71st/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, 79th, Pulaski, and 76th due to, street blockage near 71st/Pulaski.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Updated: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute near Montrose/Clark
ShortDescription: Update: 78 Montrose buses temp. rerouted WB: Broadway, Lawrence, Ashland, and Montrose; EB: Montrose, Ashland, Wilson, Broadway, and Leland nr Montrose/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: #78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Montrose/Clark.

Westbound buses will operate via Broadway, Lawrence, Ashland, and Montrose.

Eastbound buses will operate via Montrose, Ashland, Wilson, Broadway, and Leland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to police actvity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to police actvity. Crews working to restore service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
